inclusion.criterion: Resuscitated out of hospital cardiac arrest (OHCA) patients
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: OHCA patients whose GCS is 8 or less after ROSC
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: intracranial haemorrhage, active bleeding, known terminal illness, or poor pre-arrest neurological status
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis with residual deficits and a CSF leak w/ meningitis s/p lumbar drain placement. However, the patient's current condition does not appear to be contraindicated for TTM.
